main event: An airline pilot reported seeing an unidentified flying object near Bakersfield, California on November 27, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as large and star-shaped,The object was stationary for 8 seconds before making a low left turn,The maneuvering of the object indicated it was not a conventional aircraft,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The object's speed was reported to be far in excess of 200 mph.
sighted object: large star-shaped object emitting blue-white light
witness description: an airline pilot with relevant aeronautical experience
